extension.description: This plugin for Kodi v19 and above,form third-party website video resource, and its resource has nothing to do with the author of this plugin.
一个简单的搜索工具，适用于Kodi 19 及更高版本。本视频插件是基于python在kodi计算平台的应用练习，仅供阁下参考和学习。本应用的爬虫技术拓扑了第三方网站公开的网络索引内容，播放资源均与作者无关，请下载学习后删除本插件。
This plugin for Kodi v19 "Matrix" and above,form third-party website video resource, and its resource has nothing to do with the author of this plugin.
适用于Kodi v19 "Matrix" 及以上版本。本视频插件是作者基于python在kodi计算平台的应用练习，仅供阁下参考和学习。Kodi插件应用的爬虫技术拓扑了来自于第三方网站公开的访问内容，播放资源均与作者无关，请下载学习后删除本插件！

extension.summary: 面向中文用户的插件库
extension.description: Download and install add-ons from xbmc-addons-chinese addon repository.[CR][CR]By using this Repository you will be able to take advantage of our cutting edge features developed for chinese people.
从xbmc-addons-chinese库下载安装插件。[CR][CR]通过使用这个程序库，你将能够分享我们为中文用户开发的插件。
extension.disclaimer: Taxigps did not make all the add-ons on this repository and is not responsible for their content
本库中扩展功能模块不完全由Taxigps开发，对他人提交的内容不承担责任

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news:
V2.0.0 (2020-04-18) - Ported to python 3.0 for Kodi 19
V1.0.5 (2014-12-24) - fixed: can't get subtitles by title because website closed
V1.0.4 (2014-07-13) - reduce unneeded coding convertion to download faster
V1.0.3 (2014-06-27) - added search subtitles by title
V1.0.2 (2014-04-09) - added setting to save subtitles as UTF-8 - added setting for Simplified and Traditional conversion - changed to use zlib to decompress incomplete zipped subtitle
V1.0.1 (2013-12-05) - fixed to show language flag
V1.0.0 (2013-12-04) - move the service out of XBMC Subtitles

extension.description: Search and download subtitles from ZIMUKU site
从“字幕库”网站下载字幕
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news:
V2.0.6 (2022-06-11) - work for zimuku's anti-spoofing mechanism
V2.0.5 (2022-04-23) - work for zimuku's anti-spoofing mechanism
V2.0.4 (2021-05-29) - fix error: variable referenced before assignment
V2.0.3 (2021-04-05) - update main domain
V2.0.2 (2020-11-02) - support .sup subtitle - Change download url to fix download failure - Fix: Correct rating score - Ungrade: Use xmbc modules in kodi_six to take place. - Fix: Support more compressed format - Use requests to take the place of urllib2. Seems more reliable in getting page. - Forbid 7z archive since chinese chars in filename in 7z archive may cause failure.
V2.0.1 (2020-04-18) - Add screenshot
V2.0.0 (2020-04-14) - Ported to python 3.0 for Kodi 19

extension.summary: 人人影视字幕组 字幕
extension.description: Search and download subtitles from zimuzu.tv
extension.lifecyclestate: The website is closed and the service is terminated.
extension.news:
V2.0.1 (2021-05-29) - Tag as broken.
V2.0.0 (2020-04-18) - Ported to python 3.0 for Kodi 19
